data.description: Generate custom HTML tables from DB queries
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
CGI::DBTables is a CGI subclass that relies heavily on CGI.pm's
    HTML-generation methods. It automates many features of creating
    database webapps, such as browsing records, editing records, and
    inserting new records by storing as much table structure metadata as
    possible in the object. Database-specific subclasses are called
    CGI::DBTables::[DBNAME].
